amendment.description: Amendment reforms the Customer Protection Fund at the CFTC to modify the size of the fund, annual expenditures from the fund and return excess balance to the Treasury.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 115-3 to reform the Customer Protection Fund at the CFTC to amend the size of the fund, annual expenditures from the fund and return excess balance to the Treasury.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott, Austin amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Scott, Austin.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Scott, Austin.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Scott, Austin amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
